original_text: If some people speak in special languages, it should only be two or three people. They should speak one person at a time. Then someone must explain what each person said. If some people speak in special languages, it should only be two or three people. They should speak one person at a time. Then someone must explain what each person said.
korean_text: 만일 누가 방언으로 말하거든 두 사람이나 많아야 세 사람이 차례를 따라 하고 한 사람이 통역할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If some people speak in special languages
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 어떤 사람들이 특별한 언어로 말한다면

sentences.original_text: it should only be two or three people
They should speak one person at a time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 번에 한 사람씩 말해야 합니다
